name: Take a run on the wild side of Lucerne
description: You want to stay in shape and experience local culture around Lucerne? Do you like to run or hike? And do you like to discover the secret spots of a touristy place, which have not even been seen by most locals? If all this is true, then come with me to the wilderness of Lucerne. The highly diverse 10km trip will take you through the deepest forests and to the most amazing places around local nature. At the end you even get a chance to buy some fresh groceries from the local farmer for your well deserved dinner.
